options.option: Option 1 of dev: Help with code debugging. This is a longer description of what this prompt does. It can span multiple lines and provide more detailed information about the prompt's purpose and usage.

Option 2 of dev: Code optimization. This prompt is designed to help developers improve their code's performance. It can suggest various optimization techniques and best practices for writing efficient code.

Option 1 of EnhanceCodePlus: Add comments. This prompt assists in adding meaningful comments to your code. It can help improve code readability and maintainability by suggesting appropriate comments for different parts of your codebase.

Option 2 of EnhanceCodePlus: Convert to TypeScript. This prompt provides guidance on converting JavaScript code to TypeScript. It can explain TypeScript concepts and suggest type annotations for your code.
